resources.string: do you need voice over activated, please say yes or no after this beep.
there is no internet connection, please turn on data connection.
Please Speak Your Name For Login Process after this beep.
Please Wait fetching your current location.
Please Turn On Your Data Connection And GPS.
No Data Regarding this, please speak proper name.
please speak something for search after the beep.
List Is complete, for search again speak something after this beep.
No Review are there for this place, for write review speak yes or for back speak back
Your review is submited for search something speak yes or for close app speak exit.
wheelchair accessible on this place please speak yes or no after this beep
dog assistance is friendly please speak yes or no after this beep
give rating to this place out of five after this beep.
Please give review only in out of five after this beep
for listen another speak next or for search again speak back and for write review speak yes after this beep.
for listen review speak yes or listen another place speak next after this beep.
say yes or no for continue after this beep.
